| Segment | Duration | Content |
|---------|----------|---------|
| Presentation | 30 min | {{MODULE_01_PRESENTATION}} |
| Exercise | 40 min | {{MODULE_01_EXERCISE}} |
| Lab | 30 min | {{MODULE_01_LAB}} |

## Assessment Strategy

### Component Weights

| Component | Weight | Description |
|-----------|--------|-------------|
| Module Quizzes | 15% | 6 quizzes (2.5% each) |
| Labs & Exercises | 25% | 8 labs (3.125% each) |
| Participation | 10% | Engagement, questions, collaboration |
| Final Capstone | 40% | Comprehensive project |
| Presentation | 10% | Capstone demo & defense |

### Grading Scale

| Grade | Score Range | Description |
|-------|-------------|-------------|
| A | 90-100% | Excellent - Exceeds expectations |
| B | 80-89% | Good - Meets all expectations |
| C | 70-79% | Satisfactory - Meets minimum |
| F | Below 70% | Needs improvement |

### Attendance Policy
{{ATTENDANCE_POLICY}}

### Late Policy
{{LATE_POLICY}}

### Academic Integrity
{{ACADEMIC_INTEGRITY_POLICY}}

## Capstone Project

### Project Overview
{{CAPSTONE_OVERVIEW}}

### Requirements
{{CAPSTONE_REQUIREMENTS}}

### Deliverables
1. {{CAPSTONE_DELIVERABLE_1}}
2. {{CAPSTONE_DELIVERABLE_2}}
3. {{CAPSTONE_DELIVERABLE_3}}
4. 10-minute presentation

### Evaluation Criteria

| Criterion | Weight | Description |
|-----------|--------|-------------|
| Functionality | 30% | Works as specified |
| Code Quality | 25% | Clean, maintainable code |
| Best Practices | 20% | Applies course concepts |
| Documentation | 15% | Clear, complete documentation |
| Presentation | 10% | Clear communication |

## Certification

### Requirements for Certification
- Attend minimum 80% of sessions (6 of 8)
- Complete all 8 module labs
- Score 70%+ on module quizzes
- Submit and present capstone project
- Achieve overall course score of 70%+

### Certificate Details
{{CERTIFICATE_DETAILS}}
